name: Henning Wriedt
goal: Providing advice on occupational health and safety issues regarding hazardous substances, in particular to workers, trade unions, and small and medium-sized enterprises.
euInitiatives: Occupational health and safety, in particular regarding hazardous substances; such as the revision of the carcinogens and mutagens directive; the derivation of indicative occupational exposure levels under the chemical agents directive; the interface between the REACH regulation and the occupational health and safety directives
